CustomField.description: Copy & Paste Initial Client Inquiry Email into this field. Required Field upon Opp Creation in Gmail Integration Have considered automating this w Einstein Gmail integration into Activity section, however, initial email would become buried at bottom of activity chain unless we determined best practice for 'pinning' initial email to top. Starting 12/2022, Typeform now auto-populates field based on Typeform responses
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Copy & Paste Initial Client Inquiry Email into this field. Required Field upon Opp Creation in Gmail Integration Have considered automating this w Einstein Gmail integration into Activity section, however, initial email would become buried at bottom of activity chain unless we determined best practice for 'pinning' initial email to top. Starting 12/2022, Typeform now auto-populates field based on Typeform responses
CustomField.label: Initial Inquiry
